EVOLUTION_CYCLES_COMPLETED.description: Total number of successful self-modification cycles committed.

LATENCY_INFERENCE_MS.description: P95 latency of the core decision/inference loop.

FILE_PARSING_FAILURES.description: Count of parsing errors encountered during code context scanning.

RESOURCE_MEMORY_USED_PCT.description: Percentage of allocated memory currently utilized.

TASK_SUCCESS_RATE_PCT.description: The percentage of primary mission objectives completed successfully (e.g., successful refactors/scaffolds that pass self-testing).

TOKEN_USAGE_CYCLE_TOTAL.description: Total token consumption (input + output) incurred during the last complete evolutionary planning cycle.

PROPOSAL_REJECTION_COUNT.description: Count of generated code/plan proposals that were rejected by internal self-validation (e.g., failing compilation or context tests).
